data.title: About the Law Offices of Ginky L. Torres
data.meta_site_name: Law Offices of Ginky L. Torres
data.text:
Attorney Maria de L. Ramirez is licensed to practice law by the Puerto Rico State Bar. Her practice is limited to Immigration Law Only.

Admissions:

Puerto Rico State Bar

Education and Professional Associations

Juris Doctor

B.A. Education

Magna Cum Laude

AILA (American Immigration Lawyer Association)

Experience

Administrative Judge for the Department of Education of Puerto Rico .

Senate of Puerto Ricoâ€“ Legal Advisor and Legislative Assistant.

UNE- As a professor offered courses of Constitutional Law, Legal Investigation, The Criminal Process in Puerto Rico, The Penal Code of Puerto Rico and Sociology.

Fully bilingual in Spanish and English.

The information on this web page is only general information and should not be used as legal advice for a particular case or situation. Likewise, this information does not establish an attorney-client relationship. If you would like a consultation with the lawyer to analyze your case, call us at 336-862-9982 to schedule your appointment.
